text: [Music]
this course is about creating demand a
lot of people think of this as
traditional marketing but marketing has
changed a lot in the last several years
one way I like to think about it is the
company that has the most paying
customers wins so how do you get those
customers well it starts with having a
great product but that's not enough it
takes a lot more integrated marketing
efforts and that is what this course is
about you're going to have an
opportunity to learn the core principles
that stand behind demand creation we'll
go through the tricks of outbound
marketing which is really that more
traditional side of marketing you've
seen where you're out trying to find
your customers we'll also go through
inbound marketing where you want people
to find you as well as a lot on social
and then we'll tie the whole thing back
together with a living case study where
you get to really have that chance to
make a marketing campaign go
viral well what I really hope is that
you get a series of basic skills but
that it also Sparks your creativity
marketing is about understanding your
customers who they are and being able to
put yourself in their shoes and taking
these tried andrue principles that we'll
talk about in the course and using them
creatively to accomplish your company's
goals and I think what I would add on to
that is I tend to look at everything
from a strategic perspective so it's
taking what Donna just described and
really putting it in that framework of
really understanding who your target
audience is understanding what it is you
want to accomplish with that audience
and then really looking at where do they
live and how do you get that message
into them so it's taking this whole
realm of new tools we have between the
outbound and the inbound integrating
that but also making it a very strategic
approach
[Music]
